original_text: If you shout a blessing to your neighbour early in the morning, he will think it is no better than a curse. If you shout a blessing to your neighbour early in the morning,
korean_text: 이른 아침에 큰 소리로 자기 이웃을 축복하면 도리어 저주 같이 여기게 되리라

sentences.original_text: If you shout a blessing to your neighbour
he will think it is no better than a curse
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것이 저주보다 나은 것이 아니라고 생각할 것이다
